Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the imposition of a sales and compensating use tax in Schenectady county
Summary: Extends authorization for the imposition of a 0.5% sales and compensating use tax in Schenectady county.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending the imposition of a sales and compensating use tax in Schenectady county
